short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for various items with NSN number 99-1523381 and 99-7281090. The items include resilient utility mounts, gaskets, and machine screws. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. The contracts are to be awarded by the next day.

full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Title**

Multiple Victoria-Class Spares: Mounts and Gaskets

**Reference Number**

cb-88-3595589

**Publication Date**

2024-03-18

**Tender Closing Date**

2024-05-01 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Overview**

The Department of National Defence is seeking contractors to supply various spares for Victoria-Class submarines. The tender involves multiple items, including mounts and gaskets, to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. The tender closing date is May 1, 2024, at 14:00:00 Eastern Time.

**Items to be Supplied**

The following items are required:

* Item 1: 28 resilient utility mounts (Part No.: 17-1666-00, NCAGE: U0100) to be delivered to CFB Halifax.
* Item 2: 1 gasket (Part No.: SSK/M/510/60/0004 PART 216, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.
* Item 3: 2 gaskets (Part No.: SSK/M/510/60/0004 PART 216, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Halifax.
* Item 4: 100 machine screws (Part No.: SSK/Y/322/40/M001/111, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.
* Item 5: 324 machine screws (Part No.: SSK/Y/322/40/M001/111, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Halifax.

**Submission Requirements**

Bidders are required to submit their proposals in either English or French. Documents must be submitted in the format specified in the tender package. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Contact Information**

Darrell Hill, Department of National Defence

* Email: [Darrell.Hill@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Darrell.Hill@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 819-396-129

**Placement of Tender Package**

The tender package, including the RFP document and Annex A, can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34080/w8482-242161--annex-a---darrell
